skills.name: Why Rate Limit
skills.pattern: Prevent abuse, ensure fairness, protect resources, DoS defense

skills.name: Rate vs Throttle
skills.pattern: Rate limit: reject excess, Throttle: slow down, Queue: delay

skills.name: Limit Types
skills.pattern: Requests/sec, bandwidth, concurrent connections, CPU time

skills.name: Fixed Window
skills.pattern: Count per time window, reset at boundary, burst at edges

skills.name: Sliding Window Log
skills.pattern: Store each request time, count in sliding window, memory heavy

skills.name: Sliding Window Counter
skills.pattern: Combine current + previous window weighted by time

skills.name: Token Bucket
skills.pattern: Bucket holds tokens, refill rate, allows bursts up to bucket size

skills.name: Leaky Bucket
skills.pattern: Queue requests, process at constant rate, smooth output

skills.name: GCRA
skills.pattern: Used by Stripe, combines token bucket precision

skills.name: Rate Limit Keys
skills.pattern: IP address, API key, user ID, combination

skills.name: IP-Based Limits
skills.pattern: X-Forwarded-For, X-Real-IP, proxy considerations

skills.name: User-Based Limits
skills.pattern: Limit per user account, different tiers

skills.name: Redis Rate Limiting
skills.pattern: INCR + EXPIRE, Lua scripts for atomicity

skills.name: In-Memory Limiting
skills.pattern: Map structure, cleanup expired, no distribution

skills.name: Express Rate Limit
skills.pattern: express-rate-limit, windowMs, max, store

skills.name: Upstash Ratelimit
skills.pattern: Redis-based, Vercel Edge, sliding window

skills.name: 429 Response
skills.pattern: HTTP 429, Retry-After header, error message

skills.name: Rate Limit Headers
skills.pattern: X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset

skills.name: Retry-After
skills.pattern: Seconds or HTTP-date, clients should respect

skills.name: Tiered Limits
skills.pattern: Free: 100/hour, Pro: 1000/hour, Enterprise: custom

skills.name: Endpoint Limits
skills.pattern: Expensive endpoints lower limits, health checks excluded

skills.name: Burst Allowance
skills.pattern: Token bucket with burst capacity, smooth average

skills.name: Graceful Degradation
skills.pattern: Queue requests, shed load, priority queues

skills.name: Gateway Rate Limits
skills.pattern: AWS API Gateway, Kong, Nginx limit_req

skills.name: CDN Rate Limits
skills.pattern: Cloudflare Rate Limiting, AWS WAF

skills.name: Client Backoff
skills.pattern: Exponential backoff, respect Retry-After, jitter

skills.name: Request Queuing
skills.pattern: Queue requests, rate limit outgoing, bottleneck library

skills.name: Rate Limit Metrics
skills.pattern: Track hits, rejections, by key, by endpoint

skills.name: Alerting
skills.pattern: Alert on spike in 429s, abuse detection

skills.name: Load Testing
skills.pattern: k6, artillery, verify limits work, measure capacity
